name: Snowball's HELL
description:
You need to keep your coolness by staying around your cryoheart,

But THERE'S SOME STUFF SHOOTING AT YOU !

Slash your opponents and transport your cryoheart, and most important,

s u r v i v e

Controls: 

  • move with arrows or wasd
  • slash with space or mouse0
  • r to retry
  • esc to quit
